channel.title: New at Intangible Textual Heritage
channel.description: Listings of recently posted free full-text online books at Intangible Textual Heritage

item.title: NEW! The Teachings of Zoroaster (4/22/2010)
item.description: A collection of Zoroastrian texts, part of the Wisdom of the East series.

item.title: The Splendour of God (4/17/2010)
item.description: A collection of profound Baha'i sacred texts.

item.title: The Tarjuman al-Ashwaq (3/31/2010)
item.description: The Sufi quest for God, encoded in a cycle of amatory poetry.

item.title: Buy your copy of the Sacred Texts Quran CD-ROM today!
item.description: New disk with complete Quran and Islamic Culture e-book collection!

item.title: Buy your copy of the Sacred Texts DVD-ROM 9.0 today!
item.description: New version--own the Wisdom of the Ages!

item.title: Featured Text: Legends and Popular Tales of the Basque People
item.description: An excellent collection of Basque folklore from the 19th century.
